Plot: An unexpected romance blooms after the the youngest daughter of a merchant who has fallen on hard times offers herself to the mysterious beast to which her father has become indebted.
Title: Beauty and the Beast
Writer: Sandra Vo-Anh (scenario and dialogue), Christophe Gans (scenario and dialogue), Jeanne-Marie Leprince de Beaumont (book)
Actors: Vincent Cassel, Léa Seydoux, André Dussollier, Eduardo Noriega
